msbt.message: Ho ho ho! Happy holidays!<10_4 /> I'm Jingle, the black-nosed reindeer!This is the most special and exciting time of the year, isn't it? And today is the most exciting day of allIt's Toy Day!Now, I've got the very best job I can think of in the whole world. I get to help Santa deliver presents!
Lucky you! You'll be the first one on to get a gift. Here you go!
May your Toy Day be filled with magic and joy. Ho ho ho! Happy holidays, kid!
Oh, what's this? You're more loaded down than a sleigh at the start of Toy Day!Won't you make enough room for just a single item and then come back and see me?

Ho ho how's your Toy Day going so far? I hope it's merry as can be!Unfortunately, I've got a small problem that's not very merry at all I forgot the wrapping paper!Santa was so careful to choose gifts that would surprise and delight. So I can't just deliver them unwrapped!

So, ho ho how's your Toy Day going so far? I hope it's merry as can be!Unfortunately, I've got a small problem that's not very merry at all I forgot the wrapping paper!Oh, I have presents big and small, perfectly tailored by the big guy for everyone on the island!But what's the use if they aren't wrapped in festive paper? Can one even FEEL joy without festive paper?

Ho HO! I just had a thought. Something about DIY Why not?What do you say, kid? Can you help? It would behoove the both of us even though I'm kinda all set, hoof-wise.Here's the recipe! This'll be great! Just craft a little wrapping paper, and we'll pretend this didn't happen.

Ho HO! I just had a thought. Something about DIY Why not?Ah, but your pockets are full. Is there any way you could make space for at least one item and come back?After all, this qualifies as a Toy Day emergency! Festivity is falling and magic could go POOF at any second!
I just need 3 pieces of this special wrapping paper. Ho ho ho! You're saving Toy Day, kid!

Ho HO! I just had a thought. I hear Tom Nook runs a keen DIY workshop.If you wouldn't mind, could you pay Resident Services a visit and try it out?Toy Day needs you! I need you! The guy in the red suit needs you, and he doesn't even know it!
You'll need ornaments to craft the wrapping paper, but you can shake a decorated cedar tree to find those.I think 3 pieces of wrapping paper should be enough to spread Toy Day cheer!
Ho ho! All finished crafting the wrapping paper? Mind if I take them from you?
Here you go!
Not yet.
Ho ho ho! Thank you very much! And here's a little something for you. A set of Toy Day stockings!

Ho ho ho! Thank you very much! And here's a little something for<10_4 /> Oh deer. Your pockets are full!Why don't you make a list of what's in your pockets, check it twice, and then remove at least one item?
Ah, you've lightened the load! Now I can give you your reward It's some Toy Day stockings!
I wonder what might happen if you hung those in your home tonight
I see. I'm a sad little reindeer

You know, you've been such a help to me so farit's only right that I share more of the joy with you!That's right, kid. How'd you like to help me deliver Toy Day presents?Seeing the look on someone's face when you hand them a gift is the most amaaaaazing thing!And that's the gift I'd like to share with you! Along with maybe another extra-special gift for helping out.No time to question it! Here, you'll need one of these!
You know, you've been such a help to me so farit's only right that I share more of the joy with you!But I'll need to hand you something first. Can you make room in your pockets and hurry back?
Ah, you've lightened your load. That's great!

That's a magic bag. It's filled with gifts for each and every resident of this island. It's magical, see? All you have to do is visit each resident, magic bag in hand, and deliver Toy Day gifts!Now, I should tell you that this magic will wear off at 5 AM. And that's when I'm leaving too.But if you make your deliveries and return with the magic bag before then, I'll have a reward for you!Sharing the special joy of Toy Day is its own rewardbut I think you'll like what I have too.Don't worry about my deliveries. I'm happy to share! I know Toy Day is in great hands.
Ho ho! How do the deliveries go?
I'm all done!
I need a break.
Hey there, kid! How are the deliveries going?
Going great!
I need a break.
Hey there, kid! How are the deliveries going?
I'm getting there!
I need a break.
Yes, the magic doesn't make itself, does it? Well, you've been working hard, and you deserve a break!Just remember—you have until 5 AM to finish all of your deliveries.

Ho ho hmm, let's see hereYou've still got a long way to go! There's a ton of Toy Day joy left to deliver. And I mean presents, kid!I hate to think about my boss being sad because all of his gifts didn't get delivered on time Even though he's super jolly and would totally understand!Anyway, you've got until 5 AM to pass them out, OK? Good luck!
Ho ho hmm, let's see here<10_4 /> You've delivered more than half of the gifts I brought!That's the spirit! You're doing great! And here's a little delivery for the deliverer. You're welcome!
Ho ho hmm, let's see here<10_4 /> You've delivered more than half of the gifts I brought!That's the spirit! You're doing great! And if you had room to carry it, I'd have a recipe delivery for YOU.
Wondering how many gifts are left in your magic bag? You can check by opening your pockets!Keep up the good work, kid!
Ho ho hmm, let's see here<10_4 /> You're well on your way, kid!Wondering how many gifts are left in your magic bag? You can check by opening your pockets!Keep up the good work, OK?
Ho ho hmm, let's see here<10_4 /> You're making progress, kid!Wondering how many gifts are left in your magic bag? You can check by opening your pockets!Keep up the good work, OK?
Ho ho hmm, let's see here<10_4 /> You're all done! Each and every present is exactly where it should be.AhhI can feel the Toy Day magic and joy radiating from every corner of the island!
Oh deer It seems like at least one of your neighbors fell asleep before you could deliver their gift!That's so cute. Don't worry at all about it—I'll take it from here. Thanks for all your hard work!

Say, what time is it?<10_4 /> YIKES! I'm afraid I've spent too much time here on . This little reindeer needs to hoof it, so I'll take care of delivering any remaining gifts, OK?Thanks for all your help today!
Guess you won't be needing that magic bag anymore. I'll go ahead and take it off your hands.
You helped me out a lot, you know? I think I've got one more little gift for you, kid. <10_4 />Your own Toy Day sleigh!

You helped make Toy Day extra- magical for everyone living on , you know that?And, hey, I've said it before, but it still rings truethat makes me a happy little reindeer.Well, now that my— <10_4 />Excuse me! Now that OUR work is done, I think we deserve a little break!Maybe we'll run into each other againon some far-off Toy Day in the future See ya later, kid!

Hey, thanks for helping me prep gifts today. You were a really big help, kid!And I think all of your neighbors will be happy that you played a part too.Ahh, another Toy Day in the bagso to speak. It's time for this reindeer to hoof it, sosee ya later!

Hey, thanks for all of your help earlier, kid.I was going to ask you to help deliver gifts, but honestly? It's my favorite thing ever, so I was happy to do it. I'm sure they're happy that you played a part in getting the gifts ready for them though! Ahh, another Toy Day in the bagso to speak. It's time for this reindeer to hoof it, sosee ya later!
Ho ho hmm, let's see here<10_4 /> You're all done! Each and every present is exactly where it should be.AhhI can feel the Toy Day magic and joy radiating from every corner of the island!

I'm so thankful that I could share the magic of Toy Day with youbut it's not just all talk. I have gifts for you!First up is a little recipe that I think will make things even more festive around here.
And thensomething extra special Your very own Toy Day sleigh!

Wow! You've already delivered everything to everyone?Well, I've got some fun stuff for you, but it doesn't look like you have room to take it right now.Mind coming back with room in your pockets and a festive hop in your step?
Another year, another Toy Day It's always special. I'll be back again next year, of course.Maybe we'll run into each other then! I'd like that. I'll see ya later, kid.
Sodo you think everyone liked the presents I brought? I sure hope so.Well, I suppose now we can just bask in the satisfaction of a job well done. See ya later, kid!

Isn't Toy Day the best?<10_4 /> I already know the answer!AhhI wish it could be Toy Day every day. AlthoughI guess that would make it less special.Oh deer. This is what I get for overthinking it. Keep it simple, Jingle! Focus on the Ts and Js!The toys and the joys!
Whoa! Where has the time gone? Toy Day is already over!I guess is just so nice that I lost track of time.I hope I get to come back next year. Maybe I'll see you then!

Happy holidays! Say, you're not from around here, are you? <10_4 />Well, that's alright. Happy Toy Day!I'm Jingle, the black-nosed reindeer! And I'm here to deliver presents to the good folks of .I'm sure you have a little Toy Day magic waiting for you back on your own island, kid. Have a good one!

Ho ho hello! Taking this opportunity for a travel Toy Day, eh?WellI'm not from around here either. I'm actually on a business trip. But I love my work!It's a very important job. I bring the magic and joy of Toy Day to folks around the world!You see, when everyone is filled with Toy Day cheer, that makes me a happy little reindeer.
